gameelements
Class ConsoleGame

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      gameelements.Game
          gameelements.ConsoleGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ConsoleGame
extends Game

Overrides the game class mainly for the purpose of suppressing the creation of any animations, which are not needed for console games.
